room_title: Escape room "Dracula’s Castle" by Escape Room Extreme in Tampa
review: We had so much fun! Dracula’s Castle was fun and challenging. Can’t wait to return.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula’s Castle" by Escape Room Extreme in Tampa
review: Had a great time doing the Dracula's Castle! It was hard but so much fun. The staff was awesome and very helpful. I highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "Dracula’s Castle" by Escape Room Extreme in Tampa
review: Dracula’s Room was amazing! Owners are super nice. Very cool.

room_title: Escape room "Dracula’s Castle" by Escape Room Extreme in Tampa
review: This was my first time doing an escape room. The group of friends I was with who have done many escape rooms all agreed it was the best. We did Dracula's Castle which from what I understand is a more hands-on room and very interactive. We made it out with about a minute to spare. Definitely want to go back again!

room_title: Escape room "Dracula’s Castle" by Escape Room Extreme in Tampa
review: First time doing an escape room and it was awesome! I would definitely recommend the Dracula's Castle. We beat it with 1 minute and 50 seconds. It was difficult but our game master Joe was helpful and helped us when we needed it. It still made us think a lot! Great friendly staff.
